user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.name: Azure AD SAML SSO Autocreating teams
user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: Code and documentation on configuring Azure Active Directory to automatically create teams as part of the just-in-time provisioning workflow via SAML.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.name: Veracode API Credentials Expiry
user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: A simple example to get the exiration dates of api credentials for your users.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.name: Veracode Get User List
user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: Get a list of users with their attributes.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.name: Veracode Offboard
user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: Deactivates a provided list of users on the Veracode Platform.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.name: Veracode User Bulk Role Assign
user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: Uses the Veracode Identity API to add roles (Security Labs User, Greenlight IDE User, or eLearning) to existing users.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.name: Veracode UM Powershell Tool
user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: A completed User management tool write in Powershell using the Veracode APIs. You can use to create, block, delete and update users, in Windows, Linux or Mac terminal. This a simplified and translated version from the original in [Portuguese](https://github.com/IGDEXE/Veracode-UM).

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.name: Veracode UM Powershell Tool in Portuguese
user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: A completed User management tool write in Powershell using the Veracode APIs. This version is completed in Portuguese, and you can use to create, block, delete and update users, in Windows, Linux or Mac terminal.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.name: Veracode Bulk User Creator and Editor
user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: This script allows for bulk modifying and/or creating users in Veracode.
